The goal of rgeomstats is to provide accessibility to the [**Geomstats**](https://geomstats.github.io) Python library for the community of `R` users.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rgeomstats like so:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("LMJL-Alea/rgeomstats")
```
